_header: Saint Blase well clean life led without any hore
Subjects: saints’ lives; Blasius, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Blase in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEint Blase wel clene lif ladde wiþþoute hore In þe
                    lond of capadose þis godemon was ibore…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou god leue þat we parti mote of þe heie
                    blisseþat seint blase is Inne ibroȝe þat we þer of ne
                    misse

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint blas clene lyf he ladde wit outen eny horeIn þe lond of
                    capadosye þis godman was I bore…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…oure lordes aungeles com sone & here soules bere to
                    heuenelord vs þedir brynge for þy names seuene

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Blase wel clene lyf ladde wiþ outen horeIn þe lond
                    of Capace þis goode mon was i bore…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now God leeue þat we mote haue part of þe heiȝe
                    blisseÞat seint Blase is Inne i brouȝt and þat we þerof
                    ne mis A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Seynt blase wel clene lif ladde wiþoute any horeIn þe
                    lond of capadoce þis godeman was I bore…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…God lene þat we parti mote of þe heye
                    blisseþere þat seint blase is Inne i brout þat we þer
                    offe ne misse
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 485-90.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint blase wel clene lyf ladde al with oute synneBoren in þe
                    lond of Capadoce & comen of ryche kynne…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Now god lene þat we mowe parte of þe heye
                    blisseþer seint blase is inne brouȝt & þer of neuer
                    mysse
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint blasi wol clene lyf ledde al wiþ outen oreIn þe
                    lond of capadosi þis goode man was bore…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Now god leue þat we moun haue part of þe hiȝe
                    blisseÞat seint blasi is inne brouȝt & þer of neuere
                    mysse

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
[S]eint blais wel cle[ ]In þe lond of capadore [ ]for his
                    godnesse cristen[ ]…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…Now god lutte þat we mote party of þe heyȝe
                    blisseÞat S[eint] blais is inne ibroȝte & neuer þer of
                    misse
OxfCCC431.Note: Portion of text lost due to mutilation of leaves.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne blase was clene of life and full of goddes graceIn þe
                    land of capadoce þis gude man borne he wasCristen men for his gudenes
                    wald hym byshop makeHe wold noight of swilke powere bot sone gon hit
                    forsake…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…god lene vs grace so to lyfe & clens vs out of
                    synneÞat we may come to þat blis þer sayne blase is
                    in

D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.47-54.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Blase wel clene lif ladde & by þoute horeIn þe
                    lond of Capadoce þis goede man was ybore…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now god leone þat we mote party of þe heye
                    blisseÞat Seint Blase is ynne ybrouȝt and þer of neuere
                    mysse

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint bles clene lyf ladde without any horeIn þe londe of
                    capadoce þis goud man was ybore…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…God graunte þat we parten mote of þat heye
                    blysseþat seint bles is in ybroȝt þer of neuer
                    mysse

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEint blase wel clene lif ladde þo he was in loreIn þe
                    lond of capadose þis godeman was ybore…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou god leue þat we party Mote of þe heye
                    blysseþat sein blase is in y broȝt & þer of neuere
                    mysse

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEynt blase wel clene lif ladde withoute horeIn þe lond of capadoce þis godeman was ibore…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god leue þat we parti mote of heie blisseþat sein blase is Inne ybroȝt & þat we þerof me misse
BLCottJulDIX.Note: No chapter number assigned by the later annotator.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Blase clene lif ladde wiþoute horeIn þe lond of capadoce þis gode mon was bore…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now god ȝiue vs part of Ve heiȝe blisseÞat seint blase is ynne brouȝt & þer of neuere to misse

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt blas wel clene lif ladde wyþoute eny horeIn þe londe of capadocie þis gode man was ybore…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou god leue þat we mote of þe heuene blisseÞat seynt blas is inne ybroȝt þat we þerof ne mysse

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEint blase wel clene lyf ladde wiþ oute horeIn þe land of capadose þis godeman was ibore…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Nou god luue þat we parti mote of þe heiȝe blisseþat sein blase is Inne ybroȝt and þerof neuere ne mysse
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: De sancto Blasio (rubric in margin, f. 9v)

Lam223.First Lines:
Saynt blase ful clene lyf he lad here bifornIn þe lond of
                    capdocie was þat gode mon born…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…God graunte þat we part may haue of þat hegh
                    blisseÞere saynt blase has siþen ben þat vs þar hit not
                    mysse

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt blase ful clene lif ladde wiþout ooreIn þe londe of
                    Capadose þis good man was bore…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now god leue þat we mowe parte wiþ hym of heuene
                    blysWhich blase is in brouȝt and þerof neuer mys.
                    Amen.
